post:
Hello!

After a short break away from LEB we are back with a one off promotion for new customers only on our SSD virtual servers. Stock is extremely limited on this offer.

All of our Florida SSD VPSs are running:

- 4x 512GB SSDs (100k IOPs)
- RAID 10 Storage with BBU.
- Intel E3-1230 or above CPU
- Free Instant Setup with love!
- Supermicro Servers
- 24x7 Support
- SolusVM
- rDNS Capability
- 1Gbps Port

====================================

**LEB SSD VPS Package**

>- 1GB Ram
>- 15GB SSD Disk Space (Hardware RAID 10 w/BBU)
>- 500GB Bandwidth
>- 1 IPv4 Address
>- 16 IPv6 Addresses
>- Access to 1 CPU Core

Price: $7.00/mo

Order: http://mylovevps.com/hostbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=291

====================================

**FAQ?**

Do you have an ISO list? 

>Yes we do (click here), anything not there just ask and we will add it for you.

What sort of IO performance should I be expecting?

> I know how much you guys love your DD tests:
>
>  dd if=/dev/zero of=sb-io-test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync 16384+0 records in >16384+0 records out 1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 0.922279 s, 1.2 GB/s
>
>    (System: Ubuntu 12.04 - ext4 file system)

How can I pay? 

> We currently only accept PayPal at the present time.

Are your servers instantly setup? 

> Yes they are.

Do you have 24/7 support? 

> Yes we provide 24/7 support via out support ticket system.

Do you have any test IPs & files? 

>Yes we do they are located here: http://www.lovevps.com/locations/#contentFlorida-tab.

====================================


Any questions be sure to email me on matthew@lovevps.com or grab me on Skype: LoveVPS.

If you require a quote for any services please drop us an email and we will do our best to help.
